item.title: Geopolitics and AI will affect the chip industry in 2025 | KPMG
item.description: AI is making semiconductor leaders more optimistic about 2025, but headwinds could come from geopolitical and talent retention concerns.

item.title: MidJourney adds Pinterest-like ‘moodboards’ and support for multiple custom AI image models
item.description: Moodboards enable users to upload curated collections of images that act as inspiration for generating new art.

item.title: Slack’s AI agents promise to reshape productivity with contextual power

item.title: OpenAI updates ChatGPT Search with voice queries, faster results, mobile maps integration
item.description: OpenAI is updating its web search integration with ChatGPT to expand access and make it more useful to those on the go.

item.title: Google debuts new AI video generator Veo 2 claiming better audience scores than Sora
item.description: The next generation of Google's video generation model Veo promises to create more realistic-looking videos.
